inclusion.criterion: Male or female from all ethnicities
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 6 months post successful, isolated MV repair
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Atrial fibrillation (AF) at time of study related stress echo test
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known contraindication or incapability to perform peak exercise or inability to perform physical stress testing
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, EF of 65% on TTE. She remains symptomatic.
